page1.title: Welcome to Time Capsule
page1.description: Create meaningful memories and messages for your future self. Store your thoughts, photos, and dreams to be opened at the perfect moment.

page2.title: Capture Your Moments
page2.description: Add photos, write messages, and record voice notes. Every memory is precious and deserves to be preserved for the future.

page3.title: Set Your Timeline
page3.description: Choose when your capsule should be opened. Whether it's next year or in a decade, your memories will be waiting for you.

page4.title: Ready to Begin?
page4.description: Start creating your first time capsule and begin your journey of preserving memories for tomorrow.

notifications.help_message:
If you're not receiving notifications:

1. Check your device's notification settings
2. Make sure "Do Not Disturb" is off
3. Check if the app has notification permissions
4. Try the test notification button above

For Android: Go to Settings > Apps > Time Capsule > Notifications
For iOS: Go to Settings > Notifications > Time Capsule
